item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a developer and tech entrepreneur passionate about building products that solve real problems.

Background ðŸ”—

With a background in software engineering, I’ve spent years building and shipping products across various domains. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that delight.

What I Do ðŸ”—

  • Building Products â€” From idea to launch, I enjoy the entire process of creating software products
  • Technical Leadership â€” Helping teams ship quality software efficiently
  • Open Source â€” Contributing to and maintaining open source projects

Skills & Technologies ðŸ”—

I work with a variety of technologies, always choosing the right tool for the job:

item.title: Contact
item.description:
I’m always interested in hearing about new projects, opportunities, or just having a conversation about technology.

Whether you have a question, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out through any of the channels listed here.

I’ll do my best to respond promptly.
